mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, title, message, is_read, created_at FROM app_notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_notifications (user_id, title, message, is_read, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{message}, #{read}, #{createdAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM app_notifications WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
